hindi_meaning: विवाह की वेषा में सँवारी हुई
English_meaning: (and was therefore) decked in wedding dress

beautified by a train/retinue of  attendants or followers collectively

hindi_meaning: मञ्च के मध्य राजाओं के मार्ग
English_meaning: the royal road between the rows of the dias
samAsa: मञ्चानां अन्तरम् राज्ञां मार्गः इति राजमार्गः
